channel.title: Port fowarding, please help i have tryed many things and stuck
channel.description:
i have tryed to get no-ip.working but it just seems to say error connecting within 2seconds. i have port foward on my firewall and tryed to do it on my router following instructions on (www.port-foward.com) but it wtill wont let any one log on.
does any one have any ideas to help me please? if you can help me ill make u admin 4 my server because it use to be hamachi but the server advertisement hase changed so im makeing it no-ip insted.
